sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>drunkard</radical> who has his <radical>mouth</radical> on the <radical>ground</radical>, has a <radical>heart</radical> that is <kanji>misguided</kanji>. First of all, he tries to drink his problems away, but worse, he's so drunk he's trying to drink out of the ground.
meaningInfo: Picture this misguided drunkard. His whole deal is messed up.
readingMnemonic: Nowadays we don't say <kanji>misguided</kanji>, we say <reading>wack</reading> (<ja>わく</ja>). Like, damn that drunkard is so messed up, he's wack.
readingInfo: Did I do it? Did I figure out the kid lingo? Am I cool? Or am I just another wack, misguided adult?
